name: Spinaroid
description:
This is my entry for the GMTK Game Jam 2020. It is an arkanoid-like game with a twist.

The code was done entirely by me.

Some of the art was not mine and none of the sound/music was mine.

Here are the amazing people who allowed me to use some of their assets:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pxEdA6DaR4A

https://cooltext.com/Logo-Design-Dark-Magic?Font=430

https://opengameart.org/content/retro-shooter-sound-effects

https://opengameart.org/content/win-music-1

https://www.1001fonts.com/invasion2000-font.html
